channel.title: Can't connect to other servers?
channel.description:
Hi , I'm not able to connect to other peoples Servers it always tells me to check my internet settings and I have.
I don't know what to do any help would be Appreciated.
I'm not using a router either , Cable modem.

item.title: Can't connect to other servers?
item.dc:creator: @Maxlam Maxlam
item.description:
@Maxlam wrote:

But, how connect to someone else?
How host PERFECTLY. ?

Read full topic

item.title: Can't connect to other servers?
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“legend-scape, post:2, topic:243779”][quote author=Archee90 link=topic=320115.msg2535077#msg2535077 date=1226703350]
Hi , I’m not able to connect to other peoples Servers it always tells me to check my internet settings and I have.

I don’t know what to do any help would be Appreciated.

I’m not using a router either , Cable modem.
[/quote]

well tell us more, that doesent make sense what do u mean u cant connect to servers? you mean silabclient isnt working for you?[/quote]

Silab is for RS2, try checking what section you’re in -_-;

Read full topic

item.title: Can't connect to other servers?
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

no localhost is only for himself…

using 127.0.0.1 is for localhost. so he wont be able to connect to someone else with it

Read full topic
